page.title: 09Shops in Birdwell.
page.content:
Birdwell has a distinctive role in relation to the shopping requirements of local people.There are a number of small 'corner shops' selling a large variety of 'essentials',together with some very specialist shops such as a freezer centre,a tool hire place,and a furniture store.
The reason for this mixture,and the absence of any general supermarket,lies in Birdwells position on the main Barnsley-Sheffield road,and near to a junction of the M.1. motorway.Local people shop in Barnsley for thier general requirements,while the easy access to the motorway makes Birdwell an attractive site for regionally-oriented specialist stores.
